function.name: cleaningOption_turnOff
function.description: This function is used to turn off a specific mode of a robot vacuum cleaner.

location.description: The location where the device is located.

room.description: The room where the device is located.

device.description: The name or type of the device to turn off the cleaning option.

mode.description: The cleaning mode to turn off.

rvcLocation.description: The location to turn off the cleaning option.
